description: Collaborated with a team of Developers to design, develop, and deploy software solutions.
Conducted weekly client demo sessions or demos per sprint to ensure continuous improvement and client satisfaction.
Developed and executed test cases to ensure high-quality software.
Worked closely with Business Analysts and Software Testers to understand and align software solutions with client requirements.
Utilized Agile development methodologies to ensure timely delivery of software.
Utilized SQL Server Management Studio (SSMS) to manage and monitor SQL Server databases, ensuring optimal performance and availability.
Developed T-SQL scripts for data retrieval, manipulation, and reporting.
Proficiently debugged and resolved software issues, assisted other developers with troubleshooting bugs, debugging software, creating code, and developing applications.
Led a team in the last project I was working on.
Led the development of a dynamic report generation system as part of the 2-Pot System Project.
Used technologies such as Angular, SQL Server, and .NET Framework.
